text: Francisco Boedo Vazquez (born October 29, 1959 in A Coruña) is a judo athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a B2 type athlete. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics in judo. He finished second in the 86 kg group. He competed at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in judo. He finished 7 in the up to 81 kg Open group. == References == Category:Spanish judoka Category:Living people Category:1959 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople from A Coruña Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: Francisco Boedo Vazquez
